:::::{#about}

Young Ri completed her PhD in the Quantitative Methods program at The University of Texas at Austin. She is currently a [senior researcher](https://ls.snu.ac.kr/eng/sub_people/peo_info.php?idx=172&dp=studies) at the Learning Science Institute at Seoul National University. Her research interests include Hierarchical Linear Modeling (HLM), Robust Variance Estimation methods (RVE), and meta-analysis.
